how to install the firefox search addon

 # download and install [http://collective-intelligence-framework.googlecode.com/files/cifsearch.xpi cif-search]
 # restart firefox
 # open the addons window ("tools" --> "addons")
 # highlight "CIF-Search"
 # click "preferences"
 # fill in the host and apikey with their appropriate values
 # close the preference box (the values will auto-save)
 # type "infrastructure" into the "Search CIF" search box
